lexUnit.name: oppose.v

corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

lexUnit.definition: COD: disapprove of, resist, or be hostile to.

sentence.text: The purchase order is vigorously opposed by the Wolverhampton branch of CAMRA .
The idea was strongly opposed by Britain , and quickly vetoed by the Council of Ministers .
